verses.verse: And all the congregation <WH5712> lifted up <WH5375> their voice <WH6963>, and cried <WH5414>; and the people <WH5971> wept <WH1058> that night <WH3915>.

And all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175>: and the whole congregation <WH5712> said <WH559> unto them <WH3863>, Would God that we had died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>! or would God <WH3863> we had died <WH4191> in this wilderness <WH4057>!

And why has the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH935> us unto this land <WH776>, to fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>, that our wives <WH802> and our sons <WH2945> should be a prey <WH957>? were it not better <WH2896> for us to return <WH7725> into Egypt <WH4714>?
And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, Let us make <WH5414> a captain <WH7218>, and let us return <WH7725> into Egypt <WH4714>.
Then Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> fell <WH5307> on their faces <WH6440> before <WH6440> all the assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>, which were of them that searched <WH8446> the land <WH776>, tore <WH7167> their clothes <WH899>:

And they spoke <WH559> unto all the company <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, The land <WH776>, which we passed <WH5674> through to search <WH8446> it <WH3966>, is an exceedingly good <WH2896> land <WH776>.
If the Lord <WH3068> delight <WH2654> in us <WH935>, then he will bring us into this land <WH776>, and give <WH5414> it us <WH776>; a land which flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

Only rebel <WH4775> not you against the Lord <WH3068>, neither fear <WH3372> you the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>; for they are bread <WH3899> for us <WH6738>: their defence is departed <WH5493> from them <WH3068>, and the Lord is with us <WH3372>: fear them not.

But all the congregation <WH5712> threatened to <WH559> stone <WH7275> them with stones <WH68>. And the glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, How long will this people <WH5971> provoke <WH5006> me <WH3808>? and how long will it be before they believe <WH539> me <WH226>, for all the signs which I have showed <WH6213> among them <WH7130>?
I will strike <WH5221> them with the pestilence <WH1698>, and disinherit <WH3423> them <WH6213>, and will make of you a greater <WH1419> nation <WH1471> and mightier than they <WH6099>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the Lord <WH3068>, Then the Egyptians <WH4714> shall hear <WH8085> it <WH5927>, (for you brought up this people <WH5971> in your might <WH3581> from among them <WH7130>;)

And they will tell <WH559> it to the inhabitants <WH3427> of this land <WH776>: for they have heard <WH8085> that you Lord <WH3068> are among <WH7130> this people <WH5971>, that you Lord <WH3068> are seen <WH7200> face <WH5869> to face <WH5869>, and that your cloud <WH6051> standeth <WH5975> over them <WH1980>, and that you go before <WH6440> them <WH3119>, by day time in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud <WH6051>, and in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>.
Now if you shall kill <WH4191> all this people <WH5971> as one <WH259> man <WH376>, then the nations <WH1471> which have heard <WH8085> the fame <WH8088> of you will speak <WH559>, saying <WH559>,

Because the Lord <WH3068> was not <WH1115> able <WH3201> to bring <WH935> this people <WH5971> into the land <WH776> which he swore <WH7650> unto them <WH7819>, therefore he has slain them in the wilderness <WH4057>.
And now <WH3581>, I beg you, let the power of my Lord <WH136> be great <WH1431>, according <WH834> as you have spoken <WH1696>, saying <WH559>,

The Lord <WH3068> is longsuffering <WH750>, and of great <WH7227> mercy <WH2617>, forgiving <WH5375> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression <WH6588>, and by no means <WH5352> clearing <WH5352> the guilty <WH6485>, visiting the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the sons <WH1121> unto the third <WH8029> and fourth generation <WH7256>.

Pardon <WH5545>, I beg you <WH5771>, the iniquity of this people <WH5971> according unto the greatness <WH1433> of your mercy <WH2617>, and as you have forgiven <WH5375> this people <WH5971>, from Egypt <WH4714> even until now <WH2008>.
And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559>, I have pardoned <WH5545> according to your word <WH1697>:
But as truly <WH199> as I live <WH2416>, all the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> with the glory <WH3519> of the Lord <WH3068>.

Because all those men <WH582> which have seen <WH7200> my glory <WH3519>, and my miracles <WH226>, which I did <WH6213> in Egypt <WH4714> and in the wilderness <WH4057>, and have tempted <WH5254> me now these ten <WH6235> times <WH6471>, and have not listened <WH8085> to my voice <WH6963>;
Surely they shall not <WH518> see <WH7200> the land <WH776> which I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1>, neither shall any of them that provoked <WH5006> me see it <WH7200>:

But my servant <WH5650> Caleb <WH3612>, because <WH6118> he had another <WH312> spirit <WH7307> with him <WH310>, and has followed me fully <WH4390>, him will I bring <WH935> into the land <WH776> whereinto he went <WH935>; and his seed <WH2233> shall possess it <WH3423>.

(Now the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> lived <WH3427> in the valley <WH6010>.) To morrow <WH4279> turn <WH6437> you <WH5265>, and get you into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

How long shall I carry with this evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712>, which murmur <WH3885> against me <WH8085>? I have heard the murmurings <WH8519> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they murmur against me <WH3885>.
Say <WH559> unto them <WH3808>, As truly as I live <WH2416>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>, as you have spoken <WH1696> in my ears <WH241>, so will I do to you <WH6213>:

Your carcasses <WH6297> shall fall <WH5307> in this wilderness <WH4057>; and all that were numbered <WH6485> of you <WH4557>, according to your whole number, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, which have murmured against me <WH3885>,

Doubtless you shall not <WH518> come <WH935> into the land <WH776>, concerning which I swore <WH3027> to make you live <WH7931> in it <WH3612>, save Caleb the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.
But your little ones <WH2945>, which you said <WH559> should be a prey <WH957>, them will I bring in <WH935>, and they shall know <WH3045> the land <WH776> which you have despised <WH3988>.
But as for you <WH6297>, your carcasses, they shall fall <WH5307> in this wilderness <WH4057>.

And your sons <WH1121> shall wander <WH7462> in the wilderness <WH4057> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, and carry <WH5375> your whoredoms <WH2184>, until your carcasses <WH6297> be wasted <WH8552> in the wilderness <WH4057>.

After the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> in which you searched <WH8446> the land <WH776>, even forty <WH705> days <WH3117>, each day <WH3117> for a year <WH3117>, shall you carry <WH5375> your iniquities <WH5771>, even forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, and you shall know <WH3045> my breach of promise <WH8569>.

I the Lord <WH3068> have said <WH1696>, I will surely <WH518> do <WH6213> it <WH2063> unto all this evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712>, that are gathered together <WH3259> against me <WH4057>: in this wilderness they shall be consumed <WH8552>, and there they shall die <WH4191>.

And the men <WH582>, which Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to search <WH8446> the land <WH776>, who returned <WH7725>, and made all the congregation <WH5712> to murmur <WH3885> against him <WH3318>, by bringing up a slander <WH1681> upon the land <WH776>,
Even those <WH582> men <WH582> that did bring up <WH3318> the evil <WH7451> report <WH1681> upon the land <WH776>, died <WH4191> by the plague <WH4046> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.

But Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>, which were of the men <WH1992> that went <WH1980> to search <WH8446> the land <WH776>, lived still <WH2421>.
And Moses <WH4872> told <WH1696> these sayings <WH1697> unto all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: and the people <WH5971> mourned <WH56> greatly <WH3966>.

And they rose up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and gat them up <WH5927> into the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH2009>, we be here <WH5927>, and will go up unto the place <WH4725> which the Lord <WH3068> has promised <WH559>: for we have sinned <WH2398>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Why now do you transgress <WH5674> the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>? but it shall not prosper <WH6743>.
Go not up <WH5927>, for the Lord <WH3068> is not among <WH7130> you <WH5062>; that you be not struck before <WH6440> your enemies <WH341>.

For the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Canaanites <WH3669> are there before <WH6440> you <WH5307>, and you shall fall by the sword <WH2719>: because you are turned <WH7725> away <WH310> from the Lord <WH3068>, therefore the Lord will not be with you <WH3068>.

But they presumed <WH6075> to go up <WH5927> unto the hill <WH2022> top <WH7218>: nevertheless the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068>, and Moses <WH4872>, departed <WH4185> not out <WH7130> of the camp <WH4264>.

Then the Amalekites <WH6003> came down <WH3381>, and the Canaanites <WH3669> which lived <WH3427> in that hill <WH2022>, and struck <WH5221> them <WH3807>, and defeated them <WH2767>, even unto Hormah.
